name: Crystal Towers 2 XL
description: Jump and blast your way through the hostile reaches of the kingdom on your quest to recover the Music Crystals!

reviews.review_text: As I'm sure the suspiciously high playtime on my account after 1 day will indicate, I was a tester for this game, so I'm going to stick to the one thing I'm sure all who've played this far can agree on:  The 'Dust Hill A' ghost can get stuffed.
